articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Take-Two Buys Gearbox And Its New ‘Borderlands’ Game From Embracer - Forbes
articles.description: It’s just been announced that Take-Two, which owns GTA developer Rockstar, will purchase Gearbox for $460 million.
articles.content:
Borderlands 3
Gearbox
If youre a game developer owned by Embracer Group at this point, you are nervous about layoffs, shutdowns or game cancellations after the last few years. But now, there is a s… [+2409 chars]
